name: Name - The Name of the spell that will be used
spellId: Id - The spell ID on which to identify it by

effect1.effectId: Id - The Effect ID on which to identify this effect.
effect1.effectName: Name - The name of the effect.

effect2.effectId: Id - The Effect ID on which to identify this effect.
effect2.effectName: Name - The name of the effect.
effect2.duration: Time - Duration of the effect ex: 1d (s - seconds, m - minutes, h - hours, d - days, mo - months, y - years)

effect3.effectId: Id - The Effect ID on which to identify this effect.
effect3.effectName: Name - The name of the effect.
